nodes.title: Reuse the existing jar created by maven
Bump mojo-executor dep to 2.2.0 for maven 3.1 compatibility.
Proof-of-concept: Add shade mojo to create ueber jar
Parameter Map of Entires for the Manifest.
config parameter for file exclusion when unpacking dependency jars
Add css2bin parameter to buildJar Mojo
Only add dependencies to packaging if there are some.
Fix "can't package if project has no dependencies"
added support to config Main jar and classpath
Replaced the String parameter 'bundler' by a List<String> parameter 'bundlers' to allow for a more fine-grained configuration
Support for templates for JNLPBundler, and support for bundler parameters 'title' and 'description'
fixes arguments for secondary launchers not being set
fixed issue #271 by correctly determine the path to the lib-file
#256 updateExistingJar property seems to have no effect
added scanning for configured main class, but do not break (yet)
make it possible to add arguments to jarsigner-command
do not explode when `target/classes` does not exist (fixes issue #233)
Look for Mac config files in the correct location in 17-secondary-launchers
added some "failing" IT-project for new custom bundler feature
Make it possible to have custom native bundlers
made it possible to sign jar-files using jarsigner when running JNLP-bundler
Changed the way how `mvn jfx:run` works.
added property for native launcher passing arguments
Add more features and bugfixes for 8.2.0 release
added workaround for generated cfg-file by using prop-file-format
Tell git to ignore Eclipse metadata files
mention new website and added new maven-goal for keystore
add packager.jar from system-scope to libs
Check "jfxMainAppJarName" ending with JAR, because otherwise bundler …
template support, appName parameter, default values for title and description
copy additional files to generated app-folder (deep-copy)
bugfix #40 regarding missing entries within generated JNLP-file
add custom manifest entries to generated jfx-jar
fixed "permissions" not being included inside jfx-jar on webmojo
streamlined the way new entries are added for "dname"
Fixed #12 Added required parameter 'vendor' in configuration document
Revert "bugfix for issue #82 regarding multiple executions"
dont put lib-folder to resources when not needed/existing
updated version of used keytool-maven-plugin, changed from DSA to RSA
Add possibility to customize app icon and install location in native mojo
added template support for web mojo.
added support of application configuration directory
bugfix for issue #82 regarding multiple executions
Dont use "return" where "continue" was ment, breaks selected bundle-type
Add all files from jfxAppOutputDir to application resources
Fix NPE when using jfx:native goal in 8.1.1
fix null pointer exception if 'bundleArguments' is not specified
